tr_welcomeApp: 会衆サポートマネジメントツール –  Organizedへようこそ！
tr_whatIsApp: Organizedはエホバの証人の公式アプリですか？
tr_descApp: いいえ。公式アプリではありません。会衆全体でOrganizedを使用する予定なら、公式アプリではないことを念頭において長老団の承認を得てください。このような会衆の仕事を支援するために開発されたアプリが他にもあることは承知しており、それぞれに長所と方法がありますが、どれも同じ目的を持っています。
tr_appPWA: OrganizedはPWAアプリです。どういう意味ですか？
tr_appPWADesc:
OrganizedはPWAアプリとして、ウェブブラウザ内で動作します。さまざまなオペレーティングシステムで機能するように設計されているため、デスクトップおよびモバイルデバイスの両方をサポートしています。

初期設定が完了した後、Organizedはインターネット接続なしで主な機能を使用できます。
tr_appSecure: How secure is your data when using Organized?
tr_appSecureDesc:
We have added extra security layers to protect your data. In today's fast-changing tech world, we regularly update Organized to keep it secure.

Even though Organized is a web app, your data is first stored right on your device. This means you can access it, even when you're offline. If you share information with others in your congregation, it's securely synced through the cloud servers. Plus, we make sure to protect all private data with strong security measures, like double encryption on our servers.
tr_clearBrowserData: Please note that when you clear your browser history or cookies, you're also deleting unsynchronized Organized data. Before doing this, ensure that your recently created data has been synced.
tr_appPrivacy: Organizedはどのようにプライバシーを保護しますか？
tr_appPrivacyDesc:
When you choose to use our Organized app, we only collect essential information like your name and email. Additionally, we gather your device's IP address and your device's user agent details to enhance your experience with our app.

Rest assured, we prioritize your privacy. We never allow advertising companies to track you through our services or use your data for targeted ads. Any information you provide in the Organized app remains strictly confidential and is never shared with outside parties.
tr_readComplete: 上記を読み、同意しました
tr_accountCreated: Organizedアカウントが作成されました。会衆の管理者に通知し、必要な設定をしてもらってから、ページを更新してください。
tr_unauthorizedRole: You don't currently have the necessary permissions to use this application. Please reach out to your congregation elders to verify your role and then try again in 5 minutes. If they require additional assistance, they can contact us via email.
tr_oauthAccept: By continuing, you accept our Terms of Use and Privacy Policy.
tr_signInDesc: Choose how you want to log in
tr_emailAuthDesc: Enter your email to get a link for Organized authentication
tr_emailAuthDescComplete: You have successfully logged in with your email. Now you can access the app.
tr_emailAuthSentHeader: リンクが送信されました
tr_emailAuthSent: メールの受信トレイを確認してください。見つからない場合は、迷惑メールフォルダを確認するか、リンクを再度送信してください。
tr_accountSetup: Organizedアプリを使用するには、会衆の長老から受け取った招待コードを入力してください。
tr_illustrationMinistryAssignmentsHeader: 野外奉仕と会衆での割り当て
tr_illustrationMinistryAssignmentsDescri: すべての集会での割り当てを表示し、新しい割り当てに関する通知を受け取ります。区域リストから新しい区域を取得します。数クリックで補助開拓の申込書を提出し、奉仕時間の記録や詳細な月ごと・年次報告などの開拓者向けの機能を利用できます。
tr_illustrationMultiPlattformDescription: Organizedはさまざまなパソコン、スマートフォン、タブレットで使用できます。アプリはオンラインで動作しますが、インターネット接続がなくても利用できます。
tr_illustrationMeetingSchedulesDescripti: Import meeting plans from jw.org in just a click and auto-fill assignments. Share your list of outgoing speakers and request lists from other congregations to enhance collaboration. Publish schedules for both publishers and midweek students, allowing them to view their assignments.
tr_illustrationSecretaryDescription: Track meeting attendance record for all meetings, both monthly and annually. View publisher reports and easily send all necessary reports directly to your local branch. Receive and review auxiliary pioneer applications.
tr_selectAccount: To start using Organized, choose which option applies to you:
tr_accountPublisherStudent: Publisher or a student of midweek meeting
tr_wrongInvitationCode: 招待コードが間違っています
tr_checkInvitationCode: 招待コードをもう一度確認してください
tr_congregationCreateLabel: まだOrganizedにあなたの会衆を登録していませんか？
tr_incompleteCongregationInfo: Please make sure you've provided all needed details to set up your congregation
tr_encryptionCodeLostDesc: Enter your congregation's encryption code to access it
tr_encryptionCodeNotice: Please note it and keep it secure. Losing it means losing all your congregation data.
tr_encryptionCodeInvalid: The encryption code you provided is incorrect
tr_emailNotSupported: Sorry, this email is invalid or not supported
tr_2FADesc: Enter a code from your authenticator app
tr_2FAIncorrectDesc: The code might be incorrect or expired. Try again.
tr_unauthorizedAccount: Your access permissions need to be adjusted
tr_unauthorizedAccountDesc: Contact your congregation Organized administrator to confirm your role, then try again in 5 minutes. For any further assistance, elders can contact us via email.
tr_noSchedulesYetDesc: Please ask your congregation elders to publish the meeting schedule first.
